name: 헬프 미!
description:
As a psychiatrist, talk to, counsel, and treat patients.

Help Me! is a game where you become a psychiatrist and talk to, counsel and treat patients!
There are several patients in the game, and you have to choose the right treatment method and counseling dialogue.

At Help Me!, treatment isn't just about choosing an option. You will have to play various mini-games, or gain knowledge of medicines to apply the appropriate medicines and treatments. Incorrect treatment can make the patient worse or push them into the wrong choice!

Your judgment is very important in Help Me.
Choose and heal to the best of your ability.
The more you become famous...
Your hospital will evolve from an old hospital!

+ "This game is not intended to be therapeutic. If you have a mental problem such as depression or anxiety, see your doctor."
